value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's ULTRA RUSHES Clem! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: In this StarCraft 2 cast, we watch a thrilling match between Dark, the Korean Zerg master, and Clem, the French Terran. Dark surprises Clem with an early Ultralisk rush, while Clem tries to hold on with his bio army. Will Dark’s gamble pay off or will Clem’s micro skills save the day?  Support my work:

value.title: StarCraft 2: GuMiho makes Battlecruisers look OVERPOWERED! (GSL Code S)
value.excerpt: GuMiho vs Creator in a best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 from the GSL Code S. This series shows a variety of build orders and strategies, with a heavy focus on Protoss aggression and Terran defense. value.title: StarCraft 2: GuMiho's NEW Cyclones vs Clem's Reapers! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series from the StarCraft 2 ESL Open Cup on the new SC2 multiplayer balance patch. In this Terran versus Terran between Clem and GuMiho, both players have to figure out how the matchup now works with the significant changes made to the Cyclone and other units. value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
